# Seek Earthly Transit
## Overview
***The following spell is available for all [[Zwerc]] spellcasters.***

**Level**: 1st
#Spell-Level/1st

**School**: Divination
#Spell-School/Divination

**Special Nature**: Ritual
#Spell-Nature/Ritual

**Casting Time**: 1 action

**Range**: Self

**Components**: V, S, M (piece of silver)

**Duration**: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

## Effects
When this spell is cast, a pulse of magical energies travels outward, creating a trail of cyan light visible only to the caster towards the closest entry to the Amber Roads. If there is no entry within 1 mile of the place where the spell was cast, it instead leads to the closest route to the entry to an Amber Road.
